text:
WalmartLabs - iOS / Android Developer | SF Bay Area | Onsite | Full Time

We are a small team of engineers building mobile products for over 140 million customers who shop at Walmart stores every week. We are looking for product focused mobile engineers who share our passion to build high quality products and ship fast.

iOS Role: https://jobs.walmart.com/us/jobs/696347-5022

We have a similar opening for Android developers as well.

If you are interested, reach out to me at batikoglu@walmartlabs.com
